channel.title: Can i get npcs to drop things on pimpscape?
channel.description: ive just noticed that npcs dont rlly drop anythin on pimp... app from dustdevils, thats all ive seen dropped b4, anyway i just need to no if u can get em to drop stuff wen they die, if they can, tell mee how plz... ty :)
